Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The GenAI gave me feedback on my work that was much more positive than my teachers feedback. My teacher scrutinized my work a lot more and pointed out lots of flaws in my writing, compared to GenAI who gave me very positive feedback with few suggestions for improvement.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI made me feel very confident in my work and checked all boxes, whereas my teacher made me feel as though I underperformed and did not meet the mark.
